title: Reading Quiz 1
content:
Quiz: Reading Quiz 1

Points: 5.0
Due: 2024-09-04T18:00:00Z

Questions:

Question 1:
One type of Basic network security defense tool is a:
Points: 1.0

Answer Choices:
  • Firewall [CORRECT]
  • Black hat
  • NotPetya
  • Canadian

Question 2:
Which of the following is a main type of network discussed in the text?
Points: 1.0

Answer Choices:
  • Wide Area Networks (WAN) [CORRECT]
  • Social Networks
  • Peering Networks
  • Aruba Networks

Question 3:
What common protocol used to transmit most network traffic on earth was a section of the assigned chapter?
Points: 1.0

Answer Choices:
  • TCP/IP [CORRECT]
  • Appletalk
  • Valve
  • DMARK

Question 4:
The assigned chapter included a section on wireless networks, used to transmit data using radio waves.
Points: 1.0

Answer Choices:
  • True [CORRECT]
  • False

Question 5:
The OSI in OSI model stands for Optional Sidecar Insertion.
Points: 1.0

Answer Choices:
  • True
  • False [CORRECT]
